data.description:
PREVIOUS TRIVIA CRACK WORLD OWNERS GET THE FULL GAME AND EXCLUSIVE COSMETICS.
 
Welcome to Trivia Crack World, the first immersive trivia experience available everywhere! Connect with people from everywhere, compete in multiplatform matches, and explore a 3D park on your mobile, desktop, or VR device to quench your thirst for knowledge!
Trivia Crack World offers a wide range of categories, with thousands of questions in each one. Thanks to multiplatform support, you can play mini-games, discover new facts, explore an immersive 3D world of knowledge and enjoy the thrill of competition no matter where you play!
Key Features of Trivia Crack World:
-Multiplatform Support: Play on mobile, VR, or desktop - have it your way!
-Park Exploration: Discover Willy Street, a 3D virtual park filled with challenges and learning opportunities.
-Solo Mode: Test your knowledge against the Trivia Crack characters.
-Mini Games: Play fun and engaging trivia mini-games.
-Knowledge Expansion: Learn new facts and trivia in various categories.
-Worldwide Multiplatform Multiplayer Matches: Compete with friends or players from everywhere.
-Rewards & Achievements: Unlock rewards and achievements as you progress through the mini-games.
-Global Community: Join a multiplatform community of trivia enthusiasts and make new friends.
With Trivia Crack World, you can challenge yourself, meet new people, and have a great time. Download Trivia Crack World now and join the first immersive trivia experience available everywhere!
